alternativeNames: van Wyk, Braam; Wyk, Abraham Erasmus van
comments: Alternative name 'Braam van Wyk ' used in publications not describing new taxa, not to be confused with 'B.-E. van Wyk'
examples: Catha abbottii A.E.van Wyk & M.Prins in S. Afr. J. Bot. 53(3): 202 (1987).
source: Letter from D. Muller-Doblies 2 Nov. 1987. Portrait & biography in Sabonet News, 7(1): 79 (2002).
